eventCreation.title: Event Creation
eventCreation.description: Fill out the form below with all the details to bring your event to life.

description.label: Description
description.description: Provide a brief description of your event.

location.label: Location
location.description: Enter the location of your event.

header.title: Routes
header.description: Select the race category for your event.

form.loopedCourse: Start and end at the same location (looped course)

raceName.label: Race Name
raceName.description: Give your race name Ex. Half marathon competitive

distance.label: Distance (in Km)
distance.description: Enter the total distance of the race

otpDistance.label: Distance (in Km)
otpDistance.description: Enter the total distance of the race

startTime.label: Local Starting Time
startTime.description: Specify the local start time for your race

price.label: Price
price.description: Specify the entry fee for the event, including the currency, so participants know the cost of registration.
